QuestData.Title: Consulting Our Allies
QuestData.Description:
I hope Calia is right about these lords of Maldraxxus. That they know how to deal with this sort of powerful plague.
We've only got one plague eater left, too, but Faranell says he can replicate more of them as long as they're strong enough to survive.
Let's get to the Shadowlands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Margrave Sin'dane in Maldraxxus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Margrave Sin'dane in Maldraxxus.
